attributes.additional_details: We all want this Covid over as soon as possible and are more than happy to be vaccinated any time of day. We want to see our families, go to work, have our children go to school and see our friends. We will do what is necessary.
attributes.background: Arrange for around the clock vaccinations to bring the pandemic to an end quicker

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
